title: So I just encountered a "Support" similar to the topic of that singed player getting banned.
body:
I got paired up with a 4 man in normals.
Our "Support" took ignite, flash.

about 20 mins into the game, I asked him if he could buy a sightstone, as the entire team keeps walking into fog o war and feeding kills.
He responded with,  "No go buy it yourself if you want ti so badly"
Even his own friend, his ADC was asking him to buy a sightstone, to which he kept replying with a "no"

Now, he also kept leaving him alone to 2 v 1.
He kept roaming into mid and in there jungle.
Every time he did this our marksman would die, and he would ask him NOT to do that.

But he kept on doing it.

Now, we lost that game. And he never once upgraded his trinket, communicated with us. Even told his own friends to fuck off.
Refused to ward, refused to group with his carry.

Is this JUST as reportable as the singed player.
Who actually communicated with his team, didn't buy a sightstone, left his carry to 2 v 1 even tho they asked him not too.

If that singed player should be banned, then this guy should be too.

replies.body: the singed did not deserve to be banned but this "support" that you encounted definitely deserved to be banned

Yes, the difference is your playing normals where as he's playing singed support in ranks. Their 2 different topics rank and normals act different. Plus saying this guy should be banned too. That's wrong he shouldn't be banned if he only did this for one game where as the adelaideskyhot think his name is has played over 900 games doing it. BIG difference sorry if you don't see this.

I was comparing similar things as a joke, didn't say he should get banned.
I said one guy got banned for doing the same thing, why not this guy Who even had friends to tell him to play properly.
